Text Formats.quote: Plain text (.txt), Rich Text (.rtf), Markdown (.md) - Human-readable text storage

Document Formats.quote: PDF (.pdf), Word (.docx), OpenDocument (.odt) - Formatted document storage

Spreadsheet Formats.quote: Excel (.xlsx), CSV (.csv), TSV (.tsv) - Tabular data storage and manipulation

Image Formats.quote: JPEG (.jpg), PNG (.png), GIF (.gif), SVG (.svg), TIFF (.tiff) - Visual data storage

Audio Formats.quote: MP3 (.mp3), WAV (.wav), FLAC (.flac), AAC (.aac) - Sound data storage

Video Formats.quote: MP4 (.mp4), AVI (.avi), MKV (.mkv), WebM (.webm) - Moving image and audio storage

Data Exchange Formats.quote: JSON (.json), XML (.xml), YAML (.yaml) - Structured data interchange

Database Formats.quote: SQLite (.db), MySQL (.sql), PostgreSQL (.psql) - Structured data storage and retrieval

Archive Formats.quote: ZIP (.zip), TAR (.tar), RAR (.rar), 7Z (.7z) - File compression and packaging

Binary Formats.quote: EXE (.exe), DLL (.dll), SO (.so) - Executable and library files

Web Formats.quote: HTML (.html), CSS (.css), JavaScript (.js) - Web content and styling

Configuration Formats.quote: INI (.ini), CONF (.conf), ENV (.env) - Application settings storage

3D Model Formats.quote: OBJ (.obj), STL (.stl), FBX (.fbx) - Three-dimensional object data

Scientific Data.quote: HDF5 (.h5), FITS (.fits), NetCDF (.nc) - Complex scientific data storage

Geographic Data.quote: SHP (.shp), KML (.kml), GeoJSON (.geojson) - Geographic information storage

Font Formats.quote: TTF (.ttf), OTF (.otf), WOFF (.woff) - Typography and font data

Email Formats.quote: EML (.eml), MSG (.msg), MBOX (.mbox) - Email message storage

Backup Formats.quote: BAK (.bak), BACKUP (.backup), ISO (.iso) - System and data backups

Log Formats.quote: LOG (.log), PCAP (.pcap), EVTX (.evtx) - System and application logging

Cryptocurrency.quote: Wallet (.dat), Blockchain (.block), Smart Contracts (.sol) - Digital asset data

Machine Learning.quote: ONNX (.onnx), PMML (.pmml), SavedModel (.pb) - ML model storage

Memory Dump.quote: DMP (.dmp), CORE (.core), HEAP (.heap) - System memory snapshots

Key-Value Storage.quote: LevelDB (.ldb), RocksDB (.sst), Berkeley DB (.db) - Key-value databases

Stream Processing.quote: Avro (.avro), Parquet (.parquet), ORC (.orc) - Big data storage formats

Semantic Web.quote: RDF (.rdf), OWL (.owl), TTL (.ttl) - Knowledge representation formats

Medical Imaging.quote: DICOM (.dcm), NIfTI (.nii), MINC (.mnc) - Medical image storage

CAD Formats.quote: DWG (.dwg), DXF (.dxf), STEP (.step) - Computer-aided design files
